articles.title: Three Supermoons, Two Comets And The ‘Great American Eclipse:’ The Sky In 2024 - Forbes
articles.description: Your complete guide to stargazing and eclipses for 2024, including the best times to look at the full moon, planets, conjunctions, meteor showers and more.
articles.content:
2024 promises to be a fabulous year for stargazing and observing the night sky.
